call_title: Dev Update June 23 2024 | Live AMA Edition w/Armeanio

commitments.commitment: Release Armeanio prizes for ErgoHack participants after everyone else gets paid
commitments.timeline: After official ErgoHack prizes are distributed
commitments.quote: I am going to release some Armeanio prizes, but I'm going to - my plan. Don't tell anyone. Keep it - is to wait until everybody else gets paid.
Just paying me. I'll do a Rosen video.

commitments.commitment: Create multiple videos including community members chat, Sigmanauts video, and a secret video involving Armeanio
commitments.quote: And then we have we're trying to make some videos. I know there's a video that we're trying to put together with at least, you know, half a dozen or ten community members kind of just like an overall general chat about Ergo where it's been where it's from, kind of hear some new faces. And then we'll do a Sigmanauts video kind of where the things are where they came from. And then there's another secret video.

open_questions.question: How to port Sigmanauts to multiple different energy input types (CPU, GPU, different algorithms)
open_questions.context: Discussion about mining accessibility and barriers to entry

open_questions.question: How do we create stable coins backed by commodities with settlement networks
open_questions.context: Discussion about creating alternative monetary systems

key_facts.fact: Ergoversary is coming up on July 1st with spaces hosted at 4pm UTC
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Glasgow put up a vote on Paideia to give every team a hundred ERG that entered ErgoHack
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Ergo passed the four gigabyte cards limit and rolled over, making certain GPUs no longer available for mining
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Average salary in Italy is approximately 1300 dollars per month
key_facts.speaker: qx()
